meanings.definition: The state or quality of being rare.
meanings.sent1: The rarity of finding a four-leaf clover is exciting.
meanings.sent2: The rarity of blue roses makes them special.
meanings.sent3: The rarity of a talking parrot in a library would be quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a rarity in a world full of selfishness.
meanings.sent5: The rarity of a shooting star streaking across the sky left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: Something that is rare or uncommon.
meanings.sent1: The jeweled necklace was a beautiful rarity in her collection.
meanings.sent2: The old coin was a valuable rarity among collectors.
meanings.sent3: A unicorn in the city would be a funny rarity to see.
meanings.sent4: His talent for mimicry was a rarity that amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artifact was a fascinating rarity in the museum's exhibit.
